org.jasig.cas.web.support

Class CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
      • org.jasig.cas.web.support.CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TGCCookieRetrievingCookieGenerator, WarningCookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

    public class CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator
extends org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
    Extends CookieGenerator to allow you to retrieve a value from a request. The cookie is automatically marked as httpOnly, if the servlet container has support for it.

    Also has support for RememberMe Services

    Since:
    3.1
